title: Normal Notation
question_text: Distribution $A$ is $N(28,1.2)$ . Distribution $B$ is $N(25, 1.8)$ . Which of the following statements is true?

choices.text: Distribution A A has a population of 28 28 individuals and a mean of 1.2 1.2 , while Distribution B B has a population of 25 25 individuals with a mean of 1.8 1.8 .
Distribution A A has a higher mean and a lower standard deviation than Distribution B B .
Distribution A A has a lower mean and a higher standard deviation than Distribution B B .
Distribution A A has a higher mean and a higher variance than Distribution B B .
Distribution A A has a lower mean and a lower variance than Distribution B B .
